item.title: Building an IP Based Firebase Ratelimiter
item.description: Intro I have a project that I wrote 7 years ago, its still running on firebase.. no hickups (I had to occusionally update to a new node lts environment).. but it still worsks, at the time of writing/ implementing, ratelimiter was not implemented, So everyonce in a while I see the request logs and I see some IPs hitting the server with 1000s of requests, judging from the rquest.. its easy to distinguish them as bots and scanners.
